Package com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.commands

Interface IDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICommand
    public interface IDevice
extends ICommand
    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Float delta()
      Returns the delta value for this device: 0 means no delta.

      Note: 'delta' is also known as 'threshold' or 'hysteresis'.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getDeviceInit()  
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getDriverInit()  
      java.lang.String getDriverName()  
      java.lang.String[] groups()
      Returns all groups a device belong to or an empty array if the device belongs to no group.
      boolean isDowntimed()
      Returns true if device's value was not updated during at least the value of 'downtime' property.
      boolean isMemberOfGroup​(java.lang.String group)
      Returns true if this device belongs to passed group.
      java.lang.Object value()
      Returns current device value or null if device is not yet initilized or there was a problem (error) retrieving device's value.
      boolean value​(java.lang.Object newValue)
      Changes current device's state (for consistency the name is 'value').

      • Methods inherited from interface com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.commands.ICommand

        name, start, stop

      • value

        java.lang.Object value()
        Returns current device value or null if device is not yet initilized or there was a problem (error) retrieving device's value.
        Returns:
        current device value.

      • value

        boolean value​(java.lang.Object newValue)
        Changes current device's state (for consistency the name is 'value').
        Parameters:
        newValue - New device's value.
        Returns:
        true if the new value effectively changed device's value (DELTA is used).

      • delta

        java.lang.Float delta()
        Returns the delta value for this device: 0 means no delta.

        Note: 'delta' is also known as 'threshold' or 'hysteresis'.
        Returns:
        The delta value for this device.

      • isDowntimed

        boolean isDowntimed()
        Returns true if device's value was not updated during at least the value of 'downtime' property.
        Returns:
        true if device's value was not updated during at least the value of 'downtime' property.

      • groups

        java.lang.String[] groups()
        Returns all groups a device belong to or an empty array if the device belongs to no group.
        Returns:
        All groups a device belong to or an empty array if the device belongs to no group.

      • isMemberOfGroup

        boolean isMemberOfGroup​(java.lang.String group)
        Returns true if this device belongs to passed group.
        Parameters:
        group - Group name to check.
        Returns:
        true if this device belongs to passed group.
